summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Louisa Street, from Yale Avenue North to Minor Avenue North, as established by condemnation under Ordinance No. 42959, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues,by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 96287 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
